about.description: JS Slots Machine is composed of 5 reels (with more thatn 30 symbols each) and 3 rows. It follows the general rules of slot games, i.e, it aims to make the symbols spin and check if you have combinations of 3 or more equal symbols displayed at one of the 9 possible winning lines.
about.explosiveDescription: Explosive symbols combined in a line of 3-5 symbols multiply your win amount by 3-5, respectively.
about.scatterDescription: Scatter symbols combined in a line of 3 or more offers you 10 free spins.
about.wildcardDescription: WildCard symbol can take the place of any other game symbol, increasing your winning chances. At the end of each spin, there is a chance to win a bonus of wildcards.
about.title: About

controllers.checkInfo: Click to learn more about this game.
controllers.checkSettings: Click to check and change game settings.
